# Math and Geometry Types

## Overview
Math primitives and geometry helpers live in the SDK headers under `engine/sdk/inc`.

## Key Headers
- `ltvector.h`
- `ltmatrix.h`
- `ltrotation.h`
- `lteulerangles.h`
- `ltquatbase.h`
- `ltplane.h`
- `ltrect.h`
- `ltbeziercurve.h`

## Reference
- ltvector.h
- ltmatrix.h
- ltrotation.h
- lteulerangles.h
- ltquatbase.h
- ltplane.h
- ltrect.h
- ltbeziercurve.h
